translations: v．惩罚，处罚：对犯罪或不当行为的人施加惩罚，以示警告和纠正。
· The teacher punishes the students who break the rules.
老师惩罚违反规定的学生。

sentences.sentence: The English Approval Unit crime, implements two punishes the system; US "Model Penal code" also approves the unit crime.
sentences.translation: 英国认可单位犯罪，实行两罚制；美国《模范刑法典》亦认可单位犯罪。
也是珠儿叫我受着惩罚！

sentences.sentence: It then punishes violators of the rules and regulations.
sentences.translation: 其次才是对违规的人施以相应的惩罚。
